text: All This and Rabbit Stew is a cartoon with Bugs Bunny. It was first made for viewing on September 13, 1941. Tex Avery is the director of the cartoon. It is about an African American hunter trying to hunt Bugs Bunny. The cartoon is a part of the Censored Eleven. The Censored Eleven is a group of cartoons that can not be shown on television because they use racial stereotypes. All This and Rabbit Stew shows stereotypes of African Americans. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1941 movies Category:English-language movies Category:American animated movies Category:Movies about rabbits and hares
title: All This and Rabbit Stew
